channel.title: MBallSectionsDR
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from MBallSectionsDR, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Trump Should Swear Off Lawfare
item.description: He is right when he touts success as the best form of vengeance.

item.title: New Policy From ‘League Of Legends’ Developer Puts Gamers’ Free Speech In Jeopardy
item.description: Riot Games announced it plans to punish players in-game for alleged violations that occurred on non-Riot services.

item.title: Netanyahu knocks Obama, John Kerry in first appearance at corruption trial

item.title: House decides to wait until Trump administration to pass child online safety legislation

item.title: Gov. Stitt Partnering With Denmark On Pointless ‘Green’ Energy Plans Will Only Hurt Oklahomans
item.description: Oklahoma's deal with Denmark will result in thousands more acres of Oklahoma farmland lost to wind turbines and solar panels.

item.title: Trump leans into 51st state talk by praising 'Governor' Justin Trudeau of Canada
item.description: The leader of Canada has a new nickname -- "Governor" Justin Trudeau.

item.title: New Pro Golf Policy Will Let Men Compete As Women If They Look Girly Enough
item.description: The new LGPA policy will block the next Lia Thomas, while propping the door open for the next Blaire Fleming or Imane Khelif.

item.title: Biden’s Dishonest Pardon Statement Should Revive, Not Bury, Pursuit Of Crimes And Cover-Ups
item.description: President Joe Biden’s issuance of an unprecedented blanket pardon of his son should be seen as part of a continued cover-up.

item.title: Republicans Can Help Workers without Helping Unions
item.description: What America’s working class actually wants is for political leaders to pursue a pro-worker rather than a pro-union agenda.

item.title: Democrats And Corrupt Media Rush To Make Health Insurance CEO’s Murder All About Grabbing Guns
item.description: Democrats and the propaganda press rushed scaremonger about "ghost guns" after the murder of UnitedHealthcare CEO Brian Thompson.

item.title: FBI Director Christopher Wray preparing to resign
item.description: FBI Director Christopher A. Wray plans to resign on or before Inauguration Day, The Washington Times has learned.

item.title: Assad’s Atrocities
item.description: A political prisoner who served 43 years is just one of many horror stories emerging in Syria.

item.title: Qatar’s Corrupt Anti-Corruption Initiative
item.description: Glamorous awards and high-profile conferences are not enough to absolve the nation of its sins.

item.title: Speaker Johnson says 'still some concern' about Elon Musk-backed online safety bill
item.description: House Speaker Mike Johnson suggested he still has hang-ups about the Kids Online Safety Act after senators worked with X to reform it over the weekend...

item.title: Paying for Trump Tax Cuts with Trump Tariffs Doesn’t Make Sense
item.description: Tariffs may make for a good campaign sound bite, but they make for terrible international relations and even worse economic policy.
